item.title: Quick JustDial scraper
item.description: So my friend asked me to scrape data from JustDial and give it to him in an excel sheet. I thought let's give it a try. He needed name of firm, address and phone number of any JustDial URL he wants to scrape. After effectively around 4 hours of work, the below script was created. Note that the script is dirty. You need to edit the jd_url to search any other URL.
